Topic.Title: Needed: "The Things That Go Bump In The Night" walkthru

Posts.EditableText:
I've search everywhere and can't come up with a walkthru for "The Things That Go Bump In The Night". Is there one available?
I don't want to ruin the game for myself, but I sure could use a bit of help once in a while.
Posts.HTML:
I've search everywhere and can't come up with a walkthru for "The Things That Go Bump In The Night". Is there one available?
I don't want to ruin the game for myself, but I sure could use a bit of help once in a while.

Posts.EditableText:
I agree,
I've been playing iPhone version. 
I can only access the security building (have got all items), parts of the inner courtyard (nickel room and pile of stuff where the legs are). could use a little help
